title: Dark Nami Skin
body: The top is the original and the bottom one of course is a work in progress. A dark thunder Nami. I am still working on adding in the shading details to the fins which will be the dark teal. I am also working on changing her staff into a trident. I have yet to start working on the animation aspects of her spells though of course these would also change. Her Q would be a swirl of marbled dark teal and royal purple. Her W would splash dark purple and slate black. Her E would encase the target in two purple and one teal bubble along with black crackling lighting. Her R would color into mostely slate black with tendrils of purple and teal. Not really sure what more to put here so, I hope you like the concept and if you have anything to add please feel free to comment.

replies.body:
I love the idea for the particles! 

As Deep Terror Nami said - it is pretty similar to the base, but your paintover is still pretty sweet.When I hear ideas about dark-themed Nami, I immediately think of shockowaffel's idea of a Sea Witch Nami - 

http://orig08.deviantart.net/8bad/f/2014/337/0/a/sea_witch_nami_splash_art_by_shockowaffel-d88fyz0.jpg

IMO, your particle ideas mixed with shocowaffel's model would be amazing together. :3
Oh that is so beautiful! I think my main issue is not having the artistic ability to put it down to paper what I have in my head.
No, no, I think you definitely had a clear vision in your head - it's hard to draw it out sometimes. :D
Why thank you, I feel that I'm much better with painting pictures with my words than with color most days. lol. â™¥

You could add some slowing particles? Kinda like lissandra's Q gives the icy slow, with this skin the ult and and E ( on autoattack enemy ) could cover the enemy in like, creatures or maybe like, electricity? Maybe oil. 


{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I love the idea of it being oil, like a polluted aspect of it.

And if oil isn't good enough, they could get like jelllyfishes or stuff like that wrapped around them
 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
dark teal and purple jellyfish with black lighting coming off of them.
Yea!!! Could be like, when they're slowed its the oil or maybe the jellyfish with oil. Then for the stun they could have electricity.
Definitely not enough Nami skins! We've got the cute and colourful ones down---a darker-themed one would be awesome.
While we probably do need a dark themed Nami skin, I don't think people would be too happy with a Rusty Blitzcrank 2.0.
I think it would be a fun idea to make a junkyard type blitzy. Bits and pieces of old junk cars and stuff.
